column2: Anita Blake: Circus of the Damned The Ingenue (2010) #5
column6: FROM BESTSELLING AUTHOR LAURELL K. HAMILTON: A new series of vampire attacks have kept Anita's hands full. This time, it seems that this is the work of a pack of vampires instead of a lone predator - and they've been after Anita for the name of the Master of the City, but she won't give up Jean-Claude. But will protecting Jean-Claude cost her something more dear?
column8: | penciller (cover):Brett Booth | writer:Laurell K. Hamilton | writer:Jess Ruffnerbooth | penciller:Ron Lim
